name: Chicken Mac & Cheese

ingredients.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix or Herb & Garlic Dip Mix

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, cook pasta according to package directions. Stir in broccoli for last 1 min of cooking.
While pasta is cooking, combine chicken and dip mix in a Rectangular Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 4–6 min, or until cooked through.
Drain pasta and broccoli; return to pot. Stir in milk, seasoning, butter and chicken. Stir to coat.
tips: Swap broccoli for cauliflower florets or frozen peas.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup each mixed greens and veggies with 2 tsp Epicure salad dressing.
